title: Differential effect of asparagine and glutamine removal on three adenocarcinoma cell lines
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Greta Pessino, Leonardo Lonati, Claudia Scotti, Silvia Calandra, Ornella Cazzalini, Ombretta Iaria, Andrea Previtali, Giorgio Baiocco, Paola Perucca, Anna Tricarico, Martina Vetro, Lucia Anna Stivala, Carlo Ganini, Marta Cancelliere, Massimo Zucchetti, Isabella Guardamagna, Maristella Maggi
